cause.description:
The National Peace Corps Association (NPCA) promotes the work of affiliated groups of Returned Peace Corps Volunteers (RPCV) around the world. The projects featured at www.globalgiving.com/npca represent the collaborative efforts of GlobalGiving and RPCV groups to promote high-impact grassroots initiatives in locations where the Peace Corps works. Learn more and see how you can get involved or nominate a project. Also, check out what RPCV Tony Gambino has to say in his blog, Making a Difference at http://www.tonygambino.blogspot.com/
1. Returnd Peace Corps Volunteers continue to achieve great things in the world.
2. Returned Peace Corps Volunteers can mobilize support for great projects around the world.
3. The Peace Corps continues to be a major force for positive social change in the world.
cause.mission: Generate support for development projects connected with Returned Peace Corps Volunteers
cause.name: RPCVs Project! -- A GlobalGiving and NPCA Initiative
